channel.title: Making combat level say level 126 +1 when mousing over them
channel.description:
i was wondering if this could be done
i want to make that donator status give people an extra level to say +1 after what level they are
would anyone know how to do this.
i want this to show the other players what level donator they are from the +number This should give an idea how strong they are and "tough"
Sorry but idk where to start or even start looking =\

item.title: Making combat level say level 126 +1 when mousing over them
item.dc:creator: @conja conja
item.description:
@conja wrote:

I know you can make it so on someones level it says +/- the difference… so say your a level126 and you hovver over a level119 it would say Level 119 (-7)

I don’t know how to do it, probably a thread about it somewhere =]

Read full topic
item.source: Making combat level say level 126 +1 when mousing over them
